abstract: The 1918 Strand Theater will be renovated for a 61,000-square-foot complex.
snippet: The 1918 Strand Theater will be renovated for a 61,000-square-foot complex.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg on Thursday will break ground for a renovation of the 1918 Strand Theater in Brooklyn's BAM Cultural District, to be shared by BRIC Arts/Media House, a multidisciplinary arts and media complex, and the UrbanGlass reNEWal Project, a center dedicated to artistic glass.

headline.main: Groundbreaking Set for New Arts Center in Brooklyn
